member.summary: Log a message to the console. This method will rarely be called by Impart automatically unless you define the compile-time constant: LOGGING.

member.summary: Log a warning to the console. Impart will automatically call this method when something of mild concern happens.

member.summary: Log a critical warning to the console. Impart will automatically call this method when something severely bad happens.

member.summary: Whether the Website is currently running. Default is false.

member.name: F:Impart.Website.Pages
member.summary: A Dictionary of all the WebPages included in the Website. Each key is a URL path, while each value is a WebPage accessed via that path. To set a 404 WebPage, simply name the path "404".

member.name: F:Impart.Website.Listener
member.summary: The underlying TCP listener the Website uses. Do not manually start or stop as the listener thread depends on the Website methods to do so.

member.name: F:Impart.Website.OnRequest
member.summary: Called when a client requests a WebPage.

member.name: F:Impart.Website.OnListener
member.summary: Called just before the TCP listener begins listening in a new thread.

member.name: M:Impart.Website.#ctor(Impart.WebPage,System.Int32)
member.param: The local port to use. (Default is 5050)

member.name: M:Impart.Website.Stop
member.summary: Stop the Website. This will also close the TCP listener thread.
